title: pirindini vAzhvEnO
sahitya:
pirindini vAzhvEnO inip-piravip-perum kaDal AzhvEnO uyirkkiraivA


anupallavi

  karandu niraind-ennuLLE kAr mEgha minnalaip-pOl kaNDum kANAmalum paNDu mudalirundAi


caraNam    ennai nI kaiviTTAl pinnoru vAzhvuNDO ivvuDal sumappadE enakkoru tAzhvanrO
annai pOl aruLuDan anbaraik-kAttiDum ANDavanE tillait-tANDavanE unnaip-
